mapper.insert: insert into alert (alert_idx, user_idx, class_idx, alert_content, alert_common_idx, alert_role) values(#{alert_idx.nextval}, #{user_idx},#{class_idx}, #{alert_content}, #{alert_common_idx}, #{alert_role})
mapper.select: select alert_idx, user_idx, class_idx, alert_content, alert_common_idx, alert_role from alert where alert_idx > 0 order by alert_idx desc
